DOC.brief_summary: The goal clinical research study find rhIL-11（Interleukin 11） may increase platelet count Childhood patient acute lymphocytic leukemia ( ALL ) develop low platelet count receive standard CAT（cyclophosphamide+Cytosine arabinoside+mercaptopurine，7d） therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Effect rhIL-11 Patients With Thrombocytopenia Childhood ALL
DOC.detailed_description: Group A：patients receive rhIL-11 ( 50 mcg/kg，subcutaneously ) standard chemotherapy，once day 10 day platelet count ≥80,000/mL Group B：control group
DOC.criteria: new diagnosis ALL TBIL≤34umol/L，Cr≤120umol/L，a normal EF age ＜18 year patient uncontrolled infection patient Acute congestive heart failure chronicity cardiorespiratory functional defect serious cardiac arrhythmia
